body: I have been wondering what the map making server ip is, does anyone know?
body_tagged: I have been wondering what the map making server ip is, does anyone know?
title: Map making server ip

replies.body: We can't tell the IP in-game or on the forums.We have to use Skype or TS.
replies.body_tagged: We can't tell the IP in-game or on the forums.We have to use Skype or TS.

replies.body: Ok, thanks, and when are we meeting? And where?
replies.body_tagged: Ok, thanks, and when are we meeting? And where?

replies.body: We can meet right now. On TS.
replies.body_tagged: We can meet right now. On TS.
